mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM ent_music_song song
JOIN ent_music_album album on song.album_id = album.id
and song.name ~* #{name} and song.album_id = to_number(#{albumId}, '9999999999999999999') and album.singer_id = to_number(#{singerId}, '9999999999999999999')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ent_music_song ( name, album_id, track_number, language, length, size, audio_type, lyrics, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{albumId}, #{trackNumber}, #{language}, #{length}, #{size}, #{audioType}, #{lyrics}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT song.id, song.name, song.album_id, album.name AS albumName, singer.id AS singerId, singer.name AS singerName, song.track_number, song.language, song.length, song.size, song.audio_type, song.lyrics, song.create_by, song.create_time, song.update_by, song.update_time FROM ent_music_song song JOIN ent_music_album album ON song.album_id = album.id JOIN ent_music_singer singer ON album.singer_id = singer.id WHERE song.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ent_music_song SET name = #{name}, album_id = #{albumId}, track_number = #{trackNumber}, language = #{language}, length = #{length}, size = #{size}, audio_type = #{audioType}, lyrics = #{lyrics}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
